name: Mr. Toasty's Toaster Pop
description:
UPDATE - THE LATEST VERSION IS AVAILABLE HERE:
https://aspiringfires.itch.io/sandwich-hero

"Mr. Toasty's Toast Pop" let's you launch a slice of bread into the air, collecting a massive stack of toppings and condiments to make the perfect sandwich! Collect at least one of each topping on your list to successfully build your delicious lunch- and make sure you stick the landing!

This game was made for TOJam11: Don't Stop Beleven. Playable on PC or on an Android device.

Optimal PC playback:
Resolution1920x1080
Video Quality Setting: fantastic

Controls for Android:
Tilt controls to move
Tap to Launch

Controls for PC:
Click Character to start game
Space bar to Launch
Up, Down, Left and Right Arrows to move

Team:
Brian Gogarty
Tiago Rabello
Leonard Quintal
Lucas Medeiros
Grant Tabler
Chenyang "Duke" Duanmu
